description: A nun of the Church of Favonius in Mondstadt, Rosaria is a Cryo polearm user who excels at off-field Cryo application and CRIT support.
talents: Normal Attack: Spear of the Church
info: Rosaria is a 4★ Cryo support/sub-DPS who excels at off-field Cryo application and boosting party CRIT Rate. Build her for CRIT, ATK%, and Energy Recharge.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Spear of the Church
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Ravaging Confession
skills.desc: Rosaria swiftly shifts behind her target, then pierces and slashes, dealing Cryo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Ravaging Confession
Rosaria swiftly shifts behind her target (if possible), then pierces and slashes, dealing Cryo DMG. Cannot be used on larger enemies.

skills.name: Rites of Termination
skills.desc: Rosaria swings her weapon to slash surrounding enemies, then summons an ice lance that strikes the ground, dealing AoE Cryo DMG over time.
skills.details_html:
Rites of Termination
Slashes surrounding enemies, then summons an ice lance that strikes the ground, dealing AoE Cryo DMG over time. The ice lance periodically pulses Cryo DMG.

passive_talents.name: Regina Probationum
passive_talents.desc: After using Ravaging Confession, Rosaria's CRIT Rate is increased by 12% for 5s.

passive_talents.name: Shadow Samaritan
passive_talents.desc: Casting Rites of Termination increases CRIT Rate of all nearby party members (except Rosaria) by 15% of Rosaria's CRIT Rate for 10s (max 15%).

passive_talents.name: Night Walk
passive_talents.desc: At night (18:00–6:00), increases movement SPD of your own party members by 10%. Not applicable in Domains, Trounce Domains, or Spiral Abyss.

constellations.name: Unholy Revelation
constellations.desc: When Rosaria lands a CRIT hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and she regenerates 10% Energy. Lasts 4s.

constellations.name: Land Without Promise
constellations.desc: Ravaging Confession's CRIT hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.

constellations.name: The Wages of Sin
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Ravaging Confession by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Painful Grace
constellations.desc: Rites of Termination's attacks generate 5 Energy if they score a CRIT hit.

constellations.name: Last Rites
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Rites of Termination by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Retribution
constellations.desc: Rites of Termination's ice lance attack decreases enemies' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.
